article: Allan was worried. This was his first time to go traveling _ . He didn't know how to find his seat, _ he went to the air hostess and asked, Could you help me? I can't find my seat. The air hostess showed _ the seat and told him _ and fasten the seat belt . She told Allan not to move about when the plane was going up. And she also said that Allan's ears might feel _ strange, but he didn't need to _ it because many people felt _ that. When the plane was flying very high, Allan could stand up and walk around.
